column4: I have two monitors. I would like to rotate one of them 90 degrees. I don't see this option in either the NVidia settings or the System Settings -> Displays of Ubuntu 11.10 - can anyone suggest how to do this?
hardly, when even twinview doesn't work properly in oneiric ...
overall, oneiric dual screen experience is not good = doesn't work
are these known issues they are working on?
